text: Burbuja (Spanish "bubble") or Burbujas may refer to: ==Film and TV== *Burbuja, 1967 TV series with Juan Carlos Altavista ==Music== *Burbujas (Juan García Esquivel album), Mexican album for kids released in 1979 *"Burbujas", tango by Astor Piazzolla *"Burbuja", song by Si*Sé from Si*Sé (album) *"Burbuja", song by David Bisbal from Tú y Yo ==Other== *Burbujas, 2009 comic book by Daniel Torres (cartoonist) ==See also== *"Burbujas de Amor" ("Bubbles of Love") by Juan Luis Guerra 1990
title: Burbuja
